system.effect: Equips crew and hull to better deal with fire and depressurisation. Whenever component is depressurised, only suffer 1d5 Crew Damage. Firefighting tests are a +0 Command Test, and gain +10 to isolated Extended Repairs Tests. No poor Craftsmanship, Good also reduces crew damage from fire to 1d5-1, Best Craftsmanship also prevents fire spread by sealing and venting on fire components. Only one per vessel.
